{"blocks":[{"key":"daf1v","text":"Add a paper tissue to a petri dish and wet with some SSC 2X. Cover with a piece of parafilm and place two spacers on top. Place the slide on the spacers. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ncv6","text":"Remove as much of the liquid from the slide as possible. {"blocks":[{"key":"c00gb","text":"The fluidics system should now have performed the first labeling and injected the imaging buffer into the flow cell. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6fpo7","text":"Now correct the Point_set_1 positions and save the points. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"962od","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9vlq","text":"When using the provided microscope Job for Nikon microscopes running NIS Elements software, follow the steps in the Job. Select the Readout option and load the corrected Point_set_1 for the imaging. Make sure the path to the Start Imaging file is correct. This can be found in the Job, in the N LOOP under the \"MacroReadValueInFile\" and in the \"Reset_start_file\". Both need to be correct.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eovtc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"267o6","text":"Set up the perfect focus to focus on the surface.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jkga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"237lv","text":"Then start the imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnqfl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51r6b","text":"When using other software:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"crh9s","text":"Make a program that can read the Start_imaging_file located in the \"ROBOFISH/FISH_databse\" folder and start imaging the corrected Point_set_1 when the value in the file is changed to 1 by the ROBOFISH program. When it is done imaging it should reset it to 0, so that the ROBOFISH program knows it can start the next round of labeling. {"blocks":[{"key":"5kgnr","text":"Cut a gasket out of parafilm and place it around the tissue section and reference crosses. When closed, drain the excess SSC 2X from a side with a paper towel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ak7nl","text":"When using the provided microscope Job for Nikon microscopes running NIS Elements software, follow the steps in the Job. {"blocks":[{"key":"daqaa","text":"Manually Inject 1ml of 4% PFA in 1X PBS into the chamber and fix for 10 minutes at 22C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
